title: Fudanshi Koukou Seikatsu (The Highschool Life of a Fudanshi)
synopsis: Ryou Sakaguchi is a totally normal high school student, aside from his single unusual hobby. Sakaguchi is a fudanshiâ€”a man who loves reading "boys' love" manga, and fantasizing about the gay potential he sees everywhere. He has only one wish before he dies: to find himself some friends that understand his secret passion.
